title: Upgrade Solar Sparkle logo assets and apply across header, footer, and favicon

requirements.summary: Produce upgraded Solar Sparkle logo images (transparent PNG) based on the provided references, preserving the recognizable solar + panel concept with cleaner geometry and contrast.
acceptanceCriteria: New logo files are produced as static images (PNG) with transparent background.
Logo appears crisp at small sizes (e.g., 32â€“48px height) without visible jagged edges or blurred artifacts.
Color palette is cohesive and modern (no muddy gradients or low-contrast details).

file_operations.description: Add the upgraded emblem (solar + panel mark) as a transparent PNG with clean geometry, consistent stroke widths, and improved contrast.
Add the upgraded horizontal lockup (emblem + wordmark on one line) as a transparent PNG, optimized to remain crisp when scaled down.
Create the refined/modernized small transparent logo mark (v2) derived from the existing 200x200 asset, preserving the concept while improving clarity for small UI placements.

requirements.summary: Ensure upgraded logo assets are included as static frontend files under frontend/public/assets/generated with no runtime/backend dependency.
acceptanceCriteria: Upgraded logo assets exist in frontend/public/assets/generated.
The app loads the logo assets via /assets/generated/... paths with no network calls besides static asset fetches.

file_operations.description: Create a small branding constants module exporting static asset paths for the upgraded logos (e.g., /assets/generated/...); ensure callers use these paths directly (no backend/runtime fetch).

requirements.summary: Replace header and footer logo sources to use the upgraded generated logo asset(s) consistently while keeping sizing balanced across breakpoints.
acceptanceCriteria: Header (frontend/src/components/Header.tsx) uses the new generated logo asset path.
Footer (frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx) uses the new generated logo asset path.
Logo sizing remains visually balanced (no layout shift or overflow) on mobile and desktop breakpoints.

file_operations.description: Replace the current header logo source (/assets/solar_sparkle-removebg-preview.png) with the upgraded generated logo path (preferably via frontend/src/lib/branding.ts), and keep existing responsive sizing behavior.

Replace the current footer logo source (/assets/generated/solar-sparkle-logo-transparent.dim_200x200.png) with the upgraded generated logo path (preferably via frontend/src/lib/branding.ts), ensuring it remains visually balanced in the footer layout.

requirements.summary: Add a favicon derived from the upgraded emblem and wire it into the HTML head.
acceptanceCriteria: A favicon image file exists in frontend/public (or another appropriate static location) and is referenced from frontend/index.html.
After build, the browser tab displays the new favicon.

file_operations.description: Add the favicon image derived from the upgraded emblem as a transparent PNG at 64x64.
Add a favicon <link> in the document head referencing /assets/generated/favicon-solar-sparkle.dim_64x64.png so browser tabs display updated branding.
